ygData.subject: Re: quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I soloed all of the staff of the wheel except lower guk where after 3 deaths, a high level cleric helped me get it but ended up dead himself. All in all I
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> >You should be going for the staff of the wheel. I already got that >and
> >the acumen mask and the runescale cloak. I'm now trying to get the
> >temperate flux staff, but it's not easy since Sol A and Permafrost >are
> >completely horrible dungeons (ever wonder why they are virtually
> >empty?).
>
> --
> >Sergey
>
> Hey I salute you Sergey. hehe. You're pretty good at the quests...tell me
> you didn't solo all of them? :)

I soloed all of the staff of the wheel except lower guk where after 3
deaths, a high level cleric helped me get it but ended up dead himself.
All in all I died 4 times doing this quest, the fourth being in oasis.

Acumen mask I did with the help of a high level wizard, but there was
nothing there I couldn't
have done with another someone of my level. Ditto for the cloak.

I'm one rune away from the Runescale
> Cloak, I've been camping crocs in Guk but haven't found one yet. The staff
> of wheel rod stories kinda scare me so I might wait till I can find a group
> to do that one.
>

You won't. Not for all of them. The only ones who would help you are
real high levels who know lower guk and who can pull the deepwater gobs
out of the way in oasis while you get the rod. All the other rods are
easy. A group of your level would only end up dead. At best, someone
will die and you will get away with the rod.

In any case - good luck! questing is much more fun than just camping for
exp/items.

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
